How mindfulness of breathing is develope: A mendicant goes to a wilderness, or to the root of a tree, or to an empty hut.
They sit down cross-legged, with their body straight, and establish mindfulness right there.
They practice observing letting go while breathing in.
They practice observing letting go while breathing out.
Mindfulness of breathing, when developed and cultivated in this way, is very fruitful and beneficial.
